content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) and a furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -79.5)) that puts items into the furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
-  Transport belt group that connects the burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0) to the furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)

### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump (position (106.5, -32.5))
-  Pipe group that connects the offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5) to the boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
-  Pipe group that connects the boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) to the steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
-  Small electric pole group that connects the steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5) to other poles

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using undefined modules
-  Make sure to import necessary modules before using them, for example, import the math module before using math.floor

### Errors when using float values where integers are expected
-  Ensure you are using integer values when required, for example, when specifying positions, use integer values instead of float values

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables that have been assigned:
    *   `pump`: an offshore pump entity
    *   `boiler`: a boiler entity
    *   `steam_engine`: a steam engine entity
    *   `Prototype.OffshorePump`, `Prototype.Pipe`, `Prototype.SmallElectricPole`: prototype entities
    *   `Position(x, y)`: positions of entities on the map
    *   `math.floor(x)`: a function to round down to the nearest integer (not defined in this case)
